venues.name: The Old Mill
venues.description: An abandoned mill on the hillside, silent waterwheel rusted in place. Once the heart of Elena's family prosperity, now holding only secrets.

locations.name: Mill Entrance
locations.description: The front of the abandoned mill, boards covering the main door

locations.name: Mill Courtyard
locations.description: The outer courtyard where the great waterwheel stands silent, its rusted mechanism visible against the sky

locations.name: Main Hall
locations.description: The mill's main grinding floor, machinery silent and dust-covered, shafts of light cutting through gaps in the roof

locations.name: Workshop
locations.description: Tool racks and workbenches covered in a layer of neglect, but the organization speaks to careful hands that once worked here
